about_the_game:
"Barbarian" is an action-RPG game developed by a single indie developer that combines intense combat with survival and crafting elements.

In this game, you play as the last surviving member of a legendary barbarian tribe and must battle powerful bosses to defeat an evil force that threatens the world.

As you journey through the open world environment, you must scavenge for resources, cook food to stay nourished, and build shelter to protect yourself from the dangers of the wilderness.

The combat in "Barbarian" is intense and demands precise timing and skill, featuring challenging boss battles and the use of parrying and dodging to dodge and deflect enemy attacks.

With a crafting system in place, you can craft the weapons and armor that best suit your playstyle, and you can level up your character as you defeat enemies, becoming stronger.

"Barbarian" offers a thrilling and immersive gaming experience, blending elements of action-RPG, survival, and souls-like in a seamless and exciting way.

Get ready to embark on an epic journey and prove your worth as a true warrior, as you journey to defeat the evil force and save the world!

Features

In Barbarian, you can chop wood, and mine rock.

Gather materials in order to craft items and weapons.

Build a home, craft a chest, store your items.

Explore different environments with your magical horse.

Level up, and gear your character to prepare for mighty foes, and boss battles.

Note

Barbarian is currently in it's very early stages, screenshots shown are subject to be changed, and same with more information being added here in the future. If you're interested and would like to stay up to date, please consider adding Barbarian to your Wishlist.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8.1 / Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300 CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 2GB or GTX 1050 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8.1 / Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300 CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 980 2GB or GTX 1050 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

short_description: The last surviving member of a legendary Barbarian tribe on a quest to defeat a powerful evil force that threatens the world. Explore the Open World of Barbaria, gather resources, craft and level up in preparation for intense boss battles.
